_ai_instructions.USAGE_DIRECTIVE: Use <RComponentName Parameter1='value' Parameter2='value' /> in Blazor markup

NAVIGATION.components: Lines 16+: Components with structured format and essential parameters

_ai_instructions.ESSENTIAL_ONLY: Only essential parameters with AI hints shown. Standard Blazor parameters available but not documented.
_ai_instructions.UNIVERSAL_TEMPLATE_SYSTEM: Use RTemplates.Badge(), RTemplates.Currency(), RTemplates.Stack(), RTemplates.Group(), RTemplates.Avatar(), RTemplates.Progress(), RTemplates.Rating() for consistent data display patterns across all components
_ai_instructions.CRITICAL: Use exact component format for UI generation
_ai_instructions.COMPONENT_FORMAT: Each component has Purpose and Parameters with Type, enum values [brackets], and AI hints

RTemplates.Purpose: Universal template system for consistent data display patterns across all RR.Blazor components

Methods.Badge: RTemplates.Badge<T>(textSelector, variantSelector?, iconSelector?, clickable?) - Status indicators and labels
Methods.Currency: RTemplates.Currency<T>(valueSelector, currencyCode?, compact?, showColors?) - Monetary values with formatting
Methods.Stack: RTemplates.Stack<T>(primarySelector, secondarySelector?, iconSelector?, orientation?) - Multi-line information display
Methods.Group: RTemplates.Group<T>(itemsSelector, itemTemplate?, separator?, maxItems?) - Collections with overflow handling
Methods.Avatar: RTemplates.Avatar<T>(nameSelector, imageSelector?, size?, clickable?) - User avatars with initials fallback
Methods.Progress: RTemplates.Progress<T>(valueSelector, max?, showPercentage?, variant?) - Progress bars and completion
Methods.Rating: RTemplates.Rating<T>(valueSelector, maxRating?, icon?, showValue?, size?) - Star ratings and scores

RTemplates.Usage: Use in ItemTemplate parameters or ColumnDefinition.CustomTemplate for consistent styling
RTemplates.Extensions: ColumnDefinition<T>.UseCurrencyTemplate(), etc. for table columns (use RChip for badge-like functionality)

RFormSection.Purpose: Professional form section container with collapsible header and grid layout

Parameters.Title: string? - Section title displayed in header
Parameters.Icon: string? - Icon displayed next to section title
Parameters.Elevation: SectionElevation - Visual elevation level (None, Subtle, Medium, High)
Parameters.FieldColumns: int - Number of columns for field layout (1-4)
Parameters.ShowHeader: bool - Whether to show the section header
Parameters.Collapsible: bool - Allow section to be collapsed/expanded
Parameters.Expanded: bool - Whether section is currently expanded
Parameters.ExpandedChanged: EventCallback<bool> - Callback when expanded state changes

RHeaderCard.Purpose: Header card component for page titles and descriptions with consistent styling. Perfect for page headers, section intros, and feature highlights.

Parameters.Title: string
Parameters.Variant: CardVariant[Default, Gradient, GlassGradient] - Header card variant - Gradient for hero headers, GlassGradient for premium features

RChart.Purpose: Adaptive chart container that manages header, legend placement, responsive layout, and loading/error states for any visualization content.

Parameters.Title: string - Primary chart heading shown in the header
Parameters.Subtitle: string - Secondary caption displayed under the title
Parameters.Description: string - Short description emitted as aria-description
Parameters.Icon: string - Optional Material Icon rendered next to the title
Parameters.Type: ChartType[Line, Bar, Column, Area, Pie, Doughnut, Scatter, Mixed] - Declares the visualization type for styling hooks
Parameters.Variant: ChartVariant[Default, Filled, Outlined, Glass, Minimal, Elevated] - Visual treatment for the shell
Parameters.Size: SizeType[Small, Medium, Large, ExtraLarge] - Controls preset min-heights
Parameters.Theme: ChartTheme[Auto, Light, Dark, System] - Forces chart surface theme
Parameters.ResponsiveMode: ChartResponsiveMode[Auto, Desktop, Tablet, Mobile] - Resize behavior
Parameters.Configuration: ChartConfiguration - Advanced options (animation, accessibility toggles, custom settings)
Parameters.Height: string - CSS height hint for the viewport (e.g. 320px, 50vh)
Parameters.Width: string - CSS width hint for the viewport
Parameters.LegendPosition: ChartLegendPosition[Top, Bottom, Left, Right, TopLeft, TopRight, BottomLeft, BottomRight, None] - Legend placement relative to chart body
Parameters.LegendContent: RenderFragment - Custom legend markup; omit to let children provide it
Parameters.ShowAccessibilityTable: bool - When true and accessibility enabled, renders AccessibilityContent in-page
Parameters.AccessibilityContent: RenderFragment - Tabular data or alternative representation for screen readers
Parameters.ChildContent: RenderFragment - Chart canvas/visual rendered inside the viewport
Parameters.HeaderContent: RenderFragment - Action slot rendered on the right side of the header
Parameters.FooterContent: RenderFragment - Footer slot rendered below the chart body
Parameters.HasError: bool - Shows error surface instead of chart
Parameters.RetryText: string - Label for retry button when OnRetry supplied
Parameters.OnRetry: EventCallback - Fired when the retry button is clicked
Parameters.OnChartInit: EventCallback<ElementReference> - Invoked after first render with the chart canvas reference
Parameters.AriaLabel: string - Accessibility label for the root container
Parameters.Class: string - Additional CSS classes for the root element
Parameters.Style: string - Inline styles for the root element

RTabs.Purpose: Tab container for organizing content with smooth animations.

Parameters.ShowSearch: bool - Display search text input field
Parameters.SearchValueChanged: EventCallback<string> - Event fired when search value changes
Parameters.SearchPlaceholder: string - Placeholder text shown in search input
Parameters.Filters: List<FilterDefinition> - List of filter field definitions with labels, types, and options
Parameters.FilterChanged: EventCallback<FilterChangedEventArgs> - Event fired when any filter value changes
Parameters.ShowDateRange: bool - Display date range picker with From/To fields
Parameters.DateFrom: DateTime? - Start date for date range filter
Parameters.DateTo: DateTime? - End date for date range filter
Parameters.DateRangeChanged: EventCallback<DateRangeChangedEventArgs> - Event fired when date range values change
Parameters.QuickFilters: List<QuickFilterDefinition> - List of toggleable filter buttons for common filters
Parameters.ActiveQuickFilters: HashSet<string> - Set of currently active quick filter keys
Parameters.QuickFilterToggled: EventCallback<QuickFilterToggledEventArgs> - Event fired when quick filter is toggled on/off
Parameters.StatusOptions: Dictionary<string, string> - Dictionary of status values and display labels
Parameters.StatusFilterChanged: EventCallback<string> - Event fired when status filter value changes
Parameters.CustomFilters: RenderFragment - Custom filter components rendered in the filter bar
Parameters.ShowClearButton: bool - Display button to clear all active filters
Parameters.ShowFilterCount: bool - Display badge showing number of active filters
Parameters.FiltersCleared: EventCallback - Event fired when all filters are cleared

RSelectField.Purpose: /// Returns safely filtered HTML attributes using centralized RAttributeForwarder. ///

Parameters.Label: string
Parameters.Required: bool - Whether the field is required
Parameters.ReadOnly: bool - Whether the field is read-only
Parameters.Loading: bool - Whether the field is in loading state
Parameters.HasError: bool - Whether the field has validation error
Parameters.OnChange: EventCallback<ChangeEventArgs> - Value changed callback (fired on blur/change)
Parameters.OnTextInput: EventCallback<string> - Immediate text value changed callback
Parameters.OnTextChanged: EventCallback<string> - Text value changed callback (fired on blur/change)

RBadge.Purpose: Badge component for status indicators, counts, and labels.

Parameters.Variant: VariantType[Primary, Secondary, Success, Warning, Danger, Info] - Color scheme variant
Parameters.Density: DensityType[Normal, Dense, Compact, Spacious] - Normal is default, Compact for ultra-dense, Dense for data-heavy
Parameters.Icon: string[check_circle, warning, error, info, star, notifications] - Common icons: check_circle, warning, error, info, star, notifications
Parameters.Clickable: bool - Set to true for interactive badges that perform actions
Parameters.OnClick: EventCallback - Set to true for interactive badges that perform actions when clicked
Parameters.ChildContent: RenderFragment - Set to true for interactive badges that perform actions when clicked
Parameters.Class: string - Set to true for interactive badges that perform actions when clicked

RFileUpload.Purpose: Professional file upload component with drag-drop, validation, and preview

Parameters.ComponentId: string - Unique identifier for the file upload component
Parameters.DisplayMode: RFileUploadDisplayMode - Visual style mode (DropZone, Button, Inline, Minimal)
Parameters.AllowedTypes: string[] - Array of allowed file extensions or MIME types
Parameters.MaxSize: long - Maximum file size in bytes
Parameters.Multiple: bool - Allow selecting multiple files at once

RVirtualListGeneric.Purpose: Items to display in the virtual list

Parameters.TabIndex: int - Tab index for keyboard navigation
Parameters.Value: object - Main numeric or text value to display
Parameters.Text: string - Text displayed as metric title
Parameters.Subtitle: string - Additional descriptive text shown below the value
Parameters.Icon: string[trending_up, attach_money, shopping_cart, analytics, account_balance] - Material Icons name to display with metric
Parameters.Prefix: string[$, +, -, €, £] - Text displayed before the value
Parameters.Suffix: string[%, units, pts, orders, users] - Text displayed after the value
Parameters.Variant: string[default, success, warning, error, info, primary] - Visual style variant for different metric types
Parameters.Size: string[small, medium, large] - Size of the metric component
Parameters.Format: string[N0, N2, C, P, MMM dd, yyyy] - .NET format string for value formatting
Parameters.ShowChange: bool - Display change indicator with trending icon
Parameters.Change: decimal? - Numerical change value - positive shows green up arrow, negative shows red down arrow
Parameters.ChangeSuffix: string[%, pts, units, $] - Text displayed after change value
Parameters.ChangeIsCurrency: bool - Format change value as currency instead of using ChangeSuffix
Parameters.Clickable: bool - Makes metric interactive with hover effects and click events

RToggleGeneric.Purpose: Professional toggle switch component for boolean states

RStatsCard.Purpose: /// Card label text (displayed above the value) ///

Parameters.Text: string - Text displayed as card title
Parameters.Value: string - Primary statistic value to display prominently
Parameters.Subtitle: string - Secondary text displayed below the main value
Parameters.Icon: string[trending_up, attach_money, people, analytics, shopping_cart] - Material Icons name for visual representation
Parameters.IconColor: string[interactive-primary, success, warning, error, info] - Semantic color name for icon background
Parameters.ValueColor: string[interactive-primary, success, warning, error, text-primary] - Semantic color name for value text
Parameters.IconContainerSize: int - Icon container size in pixels
Parameters.BadgeText: string - Optional badge text shown next to value
Parameters.BadgeVariant: VariantType[Info, Success, Warning, Error] - Visual style for badge
Parameters.BadgeSize: SizeType[Small, Medium, Large] - Size of the badge component
Parameters.Clickable: bool - Makes card interactive with hover effects and click events
Parameters.OnClick: EventCallback - Event fired when clickable card is clicked
Parameters.Elevation: int[0, 1, 2, 3, 4] - Shadow depth level for card elevation
Parameters.Class: string - Custom CSS classes for styling overrides
Parameters.Density: DensityType[Compact, Dense, Normal, Spacious] - Layout density affecting spacing and sizing

RTextInput.Purpose: /// Returns safely filtered HTML attributes using centralized RAttributeForwarder. ///

Parameters.Label: string
Parameters.Required: bool - Whether the field is required
Parameters.ReadOnly: bool - Whether the field is read-only

Parameters.OnChange: EventCallback<ChangeEventArgs> - Value changed callback (fired on blur/change)

Parameters.Type: FieldType[Text, Email, Password, Number, Tel, Url, Search] - Input type

Parameters.Max: decimal? - Maximum value for number inputs

Parameters.ShowPasswordToggle: bool - Show password toggle for password fields

Parameters.Rows: int - Number of visible rows for textarea
Parameters.ShowCharacterCount: bool - Show character count indicator for textareas
Parameters.Resize: string[none, vertical, horizontal, both, auto] - Textarea resize behavior
Parameters.Name: string? - Field name for form submission

RLineChart.Purpose: Specialised line/area chart component for temporal or trend datasets rendered inside RChart.

Parameters.Series: IEnumerable<ChartSeries> - One or more series containing ordered data points
Parameters.Title: string - Header title propagated to RChart
Parameters.Subtitle: string - Secondary caption under the title
Parameters.Icon: string - Optional Material Icon in the header
Parameters.IsArea: bool - Render area fill beneath the line
Parameters.IsSmooth: bool - Use quadratic curves between points
Parameters.ShowDataPoints: bool - Display marker circles for each point
Parameters.ShowAxis: bool - Render axes around the plot
Parameters.ShowGridLabels: bool - Display value labels beside grid lines
Parameters.GridLineCount: int - Number of horizontal grid lines
Parameters.LegendPosition: ChartLegendPosition - Position legend relative to plot
Parameters.ShowLegendValues: bool - Append totals to legend entries
Parameters.ValueFormat: string - Format string for numeric values
Parameters.HasError: bool - Bubble error state to shell
Parameters.IsEmpty: bool - Bubble empty state to shell
Parameters.ShowAccessibilityTable: bool - Render accessibility table when accessibility enabled
Parameters.OnPointClick: EventCallback<ChartEventArgs> - Fired when a data point is selected
Parameters.OnPointHover: EventCallback<ChartEventArgs> - Fired on point hover/leave events
Parameters.OnClick: EventCallback<MouseEventArgs> - Container click handler inherited from RInteractiveComponentBase

RTabItem.Purpose: Individual tab item component for RTabs container with icon, badge, and content support. Supports closable tabs, disabled states, and badge notifications for professional tab experiences.

RTableGeneric.Purpose: Gets the filtered and sorted data for chart integration

RAlert.Purpose: Alert component for displaying important messages with different severity levels. Supports info, success, warning, and error states with consistent styling.

RTooltip.Purpose: Professional tooltip component with rich content support for links, buttons, and other R components

Parameters.Title: string - Title attribute for tooltips
Parameters.Position: TooltipPosition - Position of tooltip relative to trigger
Parameters.Delay: int - Delay in milliseconds before showing tooltip
Parameters.ContentFragment: RenderFragment? - Rich HTML content for tooltip

RAppShell.Purpose: Enterprise application shell with collapsible sidebar and header

RNavMenu.Purpose: Professional navigation menu component for sidebar and main navigation with hierarchical support. Supports collapsible groups, badges, icons, and responsive behavior for enterprise applications.

RDataDisplay.Purpose: Smart data display component that automatically detects between info and summary modes. Ultra-light unified replacement for RInfoItem and RSummaryItem with 5 distinct visual variants.

Parameters.Value: string - Value text to display - John Doe, $1,250.00, Active
Parameters.Mode: DataDisplayMode - Display mode - DataDisplayMode.Auto for smart detection
Parameters.Required: bool - Required field indicator - true for required fields
Parameters.ShowSeparator: bool - Show separator line - true for visual separation
Parameters.EmphasizeValue: bool - Emphasize value text - true for bold value
Parameters.ValueContent: RenderFragment - Custom value content - For badges, buttons, or complex value display
Parameters.AdditionalContent: RenderFragment - Additional content after value - For secondary information

RContent.Purpose: Automatic content wrapper for app shell layouts with smart positioning and responsive behavior. Similar to MudContent but optimized for RR.Blazor patterns.

RAreaChart.Purpose: Area chart component that renders stacked/filled series using SVG (with optional Canvas acceleration) inside RChart.

Parameters.SeriesData: IEnumerable<ChartSeries> - Series with ordered data points
Parameters.Title: string - Header title propagated to RChart
Parameters.Subtitle: string - Secondary caption under the title
Parameters.Icon: string - Optional Material Icon in the header
Parameters.LegendPosition: ChartLegendPosition - Position legend relative to plot
Parameters.Height: string - Height hint for the chart canvas
Parameters.HasError: bool - Bubble error state to shell
Parameters.IsEmpty: bool - Bubble empty state to shell
Parameters.UseCanvas: bool - Attempt Canvas/WebGL rendering for large datasets
Parameters.EnableTouchInteractions: bool - Enable pinch/zoom/pan when canvas mode active
Parameters.OnClick: EventCallback<MouseEventArgs> - Container click handler inherited from RInteractiveComponentBase

Parameters.TabIndex: int - Tab index for keyboard navigation
Parameters.Title: string

RFormModal.Purpose: Generic form modal component for dynamic form generation and validation

Parameters.InitialData: T - Initial data model for the form
Parameters.FormComponent: Type - Custom form component type to use instead of auto-generation
Parameters.FormParameters: Dictionary<string, object> - Additional parameters passed to custom form component
Parameters.OnDataChanged: EventCallback<T> - Callback when form data changes
Parameters.ChildContent: RenderFragment - Custom form content instead of auto-generation

RSection.Purpose: Professional content section component with header, collapsible content, and footer areas. Ideal for organizing page content with consistent styling and optional interactive features.

RSummaryItem.Purpose: Professional summary item component for displaying key-value pairs with consistent styling. Supports multiple layouts, sizes, and emphasis variants for data presentation.

Parameters.Text: string - Use descriptive labels like Total Revenue, Active Users, Completion Rate

RRadio.Purpose: Professional radio button component with enterprise styling and accessibility

Parameters.TabIndex: int - Tab index for keyboard navigation
Parameters.Items: List<TimelineItem> - List of timeline items containing title, description, timestamp, and actions
Parameters.Variant: TimelineVariant[Default, Process, Activity, Minimal] - Visual style variant for different timeline purposes
Parameters.LoadingItemCount: int - Number of placeholder items displayed during loading state
Parameters.DateFormat: string[MMM dd, yyyy HH:mm, MM/dd/yyyy, yyyy-MM-dd, HH:mm] - .NET date format string for timestamp display
Parameters.Compact: bool - Reduced spacing and smaller elements for dense layouts
Parameters.Orientation: string[vertical, horizontal] - Layout direction of timeline items

REmptyState.Purpose: /// The primary text content to display. Recommended parameter for all text content. ///

RChoiceGeneric.Purpose: Universal choice system - adapts between inline and dropdown modes

RPieChart.Purpose: Specialised pie/doughnut chart component for proportional datasets rendered inside RChart.

Parameters.Title: string - Header title propagated to RChart
Parameters.Subtitle: string - Secondary caption under the title
Parameters.Icon: string - Optional Material Icon in the header
Parameters.IsDoughnut: bool - Render doughnut instead of full pie
Parameters.MinLabelPercentage: double - Minimum percentage required to show label
Parameters.ShowCenterValue: bool - Display aggregate value in doughnut center
Parameters.CenterLabel: string - Label text below the center value badge
Parameters.ShowLegendValues: bool - Append values to legend entries
Parameters.ShowLegendPercentages: bool - Append percentage to legend entries
Parameters.ValueFormat: string - Format string for numeric values
Parameters.HasError: bool - Bubble error state to shell
Parameters.IsEmpty: bool - Bubble empty state to shell
Parameters.ShowAccessibilityTable: bool - Render accessibility table when accessibility enabled
Parameters.EnableTouchInteractions: bool - Enable hover/click gestures on touch devices
Parameters.OnClick: EventCallback<MouseEventArgs> - Container click handler inherited from RInteractiveComponentBase

RFormGeneric.Purpose: Form component with validation, state management, and accessibility

Parameters.Model: TModel - Data model bound to the form
Parameters.ModelChanged: EventCallback<TModel> - Callback when model data changes
Parameters.OnValidSubmitTyped: EventCallback<FormSubmissionEventArgs<TModel>> - Called when form is submitted with valid data
Parameters.OnInvalidSubmitTyped: EventCallback<FormSubmissionEventArgs<TModel>> - Called when form is submitted with invalid data
Parameters.OnStateChangedTyped: EventCallback<FormStateChangedEventArgs> - Called when form state changes (submitting, success, error)

RCalendar.Purpose: Ultra-professional, customizable calendar component with modern glassmorphism design. Supports events, custom rendering, responsive layouts, and advanced navigation patterns.

RErrorBoundary.Purpose: Error boundary component for isolating component failures and providing graceful fallback UI. Captures unhandled exceptions in child components and displays user-friendly error messages.

RChip.Purpose: Chip component for tags, badges, and status indicators with style variants.

Parameters.Style: ChipStyle[Badge, Chip, Status, Rounded, Minimal, Outline] - Badge for counts, Chip for tags/filters, Status for state indicators, Outline for light tonal badges
Parameters.Variant: VariantType[Primary, Secondary, Success, Warning, Error, Info] - Primary for emphasis, Success for positive, Warning for attention, Error for problems
Parameters.Text: string - Keep short: Active, 5, New, Pending. Use 1-20 characters max
Parameters.Icon: string[check_circle, warning, error, info, star, notifications] - Common icons: check_circle, warning, error, info, star, notifications
Parameters.Size: SizeType[Small, Medium, Large] - Small for compact, Medium for standard, Large for prominence
Parameters.Density: DensityType[Normal, Dense, Compact, Spacious] - Normal is default, Compact for ultra-dense, Dense for data-heavy
Parameters.Clickable: bool - Set to true for interactive chips that perform actions
Parameters.Closeable: bool - Set to true for removable tags and filter chips
Parameters.Selected: bool - Set to true for removable tags and filter chips
Parameters.Disabled: bool - Set to true for removable tags and filter chips
Parameters.ShowPulse: bool - Shows pulse animation for processing/loading states
Parameters.OnClick: EventCallback - Automatically enabled for Processing variant when Style is Status
Parameters.OnClose: EventCallback - Automatically enabled for Processing variant when Style is Status
Parameters.ChildContent: RenderFragment - Automatically enabled for Processing variant when Style is Status

Parameters.IconPosition: IconPosition[Start, End, Top, Bottom] - Icon position

RCard.Purpose: Card component with header, media, content areas, and loading states.

Parameters.Variant: CardVariant[Default, Outlined, Elevated, Glass, Flat, Gradient, GlassGradient] - Default for standard, Elevated for prominence, Glass for overlays, Gradient for hero sections, GlassGradient for premium features
Parameters.Subtitle: string - Secondary text below title
Parameters.Icon: string[dashboard, person, settings, analytics, payment, work] - Icon name
Parameters.ImageSrc: string - Use for hero images, thumbnails, or visual content
Parameters.ImageAlt: string - Use for hero images, thumbnails, or visual content in cards
Parameters.Clickable: bool - Set to true for interactive cards that perform actions
Parameters.Loading: bool - Use during async operations to show processing state
Parameters.LoadingText: string - Use during async operations to indicate processing state
Parameters.Selected: bool - Use during async operations to indicate processing state
Parameters.RibbonText: string - Use during async operations to indicate processing state
Parameters.BodyClass: string - Customize content area styling - padding, layout, spacing. Overrides defaults.
Parameters.HeaderContent: RenderFragment - Use to customize padding, layout, spacing of the card content area. Overrides default padding when specified.
Parameters.MediaContent: RenderFragment - Use to customize padding, layout, spacing of the card content area. Overrides default padding when specified.

RInfoItem.Purpose: Label text for the info item

RDatePicker.Purpose: Professional date picker with calendar popup

RChartGeneric.Purpose: Strongly-typed chart façade that consumes raw entities, custom builders, or pre-shaped series and renders column, bar, line, area, pie, or doughnut charts inside the adaptive RChart shell.

Parameters.Data: IEnumerable<T>? - Source dataset (use with selector delegates)
Parameters.DataPoints: IEnumerable<ChartDataPoint>? - Pre-shaped points when you already mapped data
Parameters.Series: IEnumerable<ChartSeries>? - Pre-grouped series for multi-series/stacked scenarios
Parameters.DataBuilder: Func<IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable<ChartDataPoint>>? - Custom pipeline to shape points
Parameters.SeriesBuilder: Func<IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable<ChartSeries>>? - Custom pipeline to shape series collections
Parameters.LabelSelector: Func<T, string>? - Extract category label when using Data
Parameters.ValueSelector: Func<T, double>? - Extract numeric value when using Data
Parameters.SeriesSelector: Func<T, string>? - Split Data into multiple series groups
Parameters.CategorySelector: Func<T, string>? - Attach category metadata per point
Parameters.ColorSelector: Func<T, string>? - Force specific colors for points/series
Parameters.MetadataSelector: Func<T, Dictionary<string, object>>? - Attach arbitrary metadata per point
Parameters.Type: ChartType? - Override detected visualization type (Column default)
Parameters.StackMode: ChartStackMode[None, Stacked] - Controls bar/column stacking behavior
Parameters.Title: string - Header title propagated to RChart
Parameters.Subtitle: string - Header subtitle text
Parameters.Description: string - Accessibility description for the chart
Parameters.Icon: string - Optional Material Icon beside the title
Parameters.ResponsiveMode: ChartResponsiveMode - Resize behavior for the shell
Parameters.Configuration: ChartConfiguration - Advanced feature switches passed to RChart
Parameters.LegendPosition: ChartLegendPosition - Position legend relative to plot
Parameters.ShowLegendValues: bool - Append numeric totals to legend items
Parameters.ShowLegendPercentages: bool - Append share percentages to legend items
Parameters.ShowBarValues: bool - Render value labels above/beside bars
Parameters.ShowGridLines: bool - Render horizontal grid lines for line/area charts
Parameters.ShowLinePoints: bool - Render SVG points for line charts
Parameters.GridLineCount: int - Number of horizontal grid bands to render
Parameters.LinePointRadius: double - Radius (in viewBox units) for line chart points
Parameters.DoughnutInnerRatio: double - Inner circle ratio for doughnut charts (0-1)
Parameters.ShowPieCenterValue: bool - Display aggregate value badge in doughnut center
Parameters.CenterLabel: string - Label displayed under the center value badge
Parameters.ValueFormat: string - .NET format string used for numeric values
Parameters.TooltipFormatter: Func<ChartDataPoint, string>? - Override tooltip text per point
Parameters.Height: string - Height hint passed to RChart (e.g. 340px, 40vh)
Parameters.Width: string - Width hint passed to RChart
Parameters.Loading: bool - Bubble loading state to RChart shell
Parameters.LoadingText: string - Loading caption displayed in shell
Parameters.HasError: bool - Bubble error state to shell
Parameters.RetryText: string - Retry button label when OnRetry provided
Parameters.EmptyTitle: string - Empty-state heading when data set is empty
Parameters.EmptyMessage: string - Empty-state description when data set is empty
Parameters.ShowAccessibilityTable: bool - Render generated accessibility table when true
Parameters.HeaderContent: RenderFragment? - Additional header actions beside the title
Parameters.FooterContent: RenderFragment? - Footer slot below chart body
Parameters.OnRetry: EventCallback - Invoked when retry button clicked
Parameters.OnChartInit: EventCallback<ElementReference> - Fired after first render with chart canvas reference
Parameters.OnClick: EventCallback<MouseEventArgs> - Surface click handler inherited from RInteractiveComponentBase
Parameters.Class: string - Extra CSS classes forwarded to RChart
Parameters.Style: string - Inline styles forwarded to RChart

RBreadcrumbs.Purpose: Professional breadcrumb navigation component for showing page hierarchy and navigation paths. Supports icons, custom separators, responsive collapsing, and accessibility features.

RColumnChart.Purpose: High-level column/bar chart component that renders categorical datasets using HTML/SVG inside the adaptive RChart shell.

Parameters.Data: IEnumerable<ChartDataPoint> - Category/value pairs rendered as bars
Parameters.Title: string - Header title forwarded to RChart
Parameters.Subtitle: string - Secondary caption under the title
Parameters.Icon: string - Optional Material Icon next to the title
Parameters.IsHorizontal: bool - Switch to horizontal bar layout
Parameters.ShowValues: bool - Show value badge on each bar
Parameters.ShowGridLines: bool - Render grid lines inside plot
Parameters.ShowLegendValues: bool - Display value summary inside legend
Parameters.ValueFormat: string - Format string for value labels
Parameters.HasError: bool - Bubble error state to shell
Parameters.IsEmpty: bool - Bubble empty state to shell
Parameters.ShowAccessibilityTable: bool - Render accessibility table when accessibility enabled

RKanboard.Purpose: Enterprise kanban board shell with drag-and-drop, inline quick actions, Trello-style metadata (labels, attachments, watchers), orientation switching, and assignment overlay

Parameters.Board: RKanboardBoardState - Column and card data source
Parameters.AllowHorizontal: bool - Permit switching into horizontal/swimlane orientation
Parameters.AllowOrientationToggle: bool - Enable built-in orientation toggle buttons
Parameters.AllowColumnHide: bool - Allow columns to be hidden or shown
Parameters.AllowUnassign: bool - Allow clearing assignee from cards
Parameters.EnableSwimlanes: bool - Group columns by swimlane metadata and render headers
Parameters.EmptyState: RenderFragment - Placeholder when no columns exist
Parameters.AssigneeOptions: IEnumerable<RKanboardAssigneeOption> - Directory entries for inline picker
Parameters.AutoAssignRules: IEnumerable<RKanboardAutoAssignRule> - Rules evaluated on drop for suggested assignees
Parameters.CanDragEvaluator: Func<RKanboardCardModel, RKanboardColumnModel, bool> - Security hook to disable dragging per card
Parameters.ColumnTemplates: IReadOnlyList<RKanboardColumnTemplate> - Quick-add column templates surfaced in creation panel
Parameters.ShowColumnTemplates: bool - Toggle display of template quick-add buttons
Parameters.OnCardDrop: EventCallback<RKanboardCardDropContext> - Fired after card drag/drop commit
Parameters.OnCardOpen: EventCallback<string> - Fired when quick-open action invoked
Parameters.OnCardEditRequested: EventCallback<string> - Fired when inline edit action is requested
Parameters.OnCardPriorityRequested: EventCallback<RKanboardCardModel> - Fired when priority quick action is used
Parameters.OnCardCommentRequested: EventCallback<RKanboardCardModel> - Fired when comment quick action is used
Parameters.OrientationChanged: EventCallback<KanboardOrientation> - Fired when orientation toggle updates
Parameters.ShowEditAction: bool - Render inline edit quick action button
Parameters.ShowPriorityAction: bool - Render inline priority quick action button
Parameters.ShowCommentAction: bool - Render inline comment quick action button
Parameters.EnableKeyboardShortcuts: bool - Enable keyboard navigation and move shortcuts
Parameters.EnableVirtualization: bool - Use Blazor Virtualize for large column card sets
Parameters.VirtualizationThreshold: int - Card count threshold before virtualization engages
Parameters.VirtualizationItemSize: float - Estimated card height for virtualization
Parameters.VirtualizationOverscanCount: int - Additional items rendered before/after viewport
Parameters.EnableAutoScroll: bool - Auto-scroll board containers while dragging cards/columns
Parameters.AutoScrollEdgeThreshold: int - Pixel distance from edge before auto-scroll engages
Parameters.AutoScrollSpeed: int - Scroll delta applied per animation frame
Parameters.Size: SizeType - Applies RR sizing token to board footprint
Parameters.Variant: VariantType - Controls accent color for interactions
Parameters.Density: DensityType - Adjusts spacing for dense or spacious layouts

RCheckbox.Purpose: Professional checkbox component with enterprise styling and accessibility
